DOC.brief_summary: Parents receive anticipatory guidance obesity prevention part routine well child visit . Educational resource need help physician routinely provide important anticipatory guidance message . In study , consecutive parent expose routine anticipatory guidance message well child visit physician . After clinic visit , parent invite participate research study determine plan change home . The key research question study : Can brief multimedia intervention help parent develop plan help child healthy weight ?
DOC.brief_title: Can Brief Primary Care Intervention Affect Healthy Weight Habits
DOC.criteria: English Spanish speaking parent 212 year old child present pediatric primary care clinic . Parent speak English Spanish . Child present acute care visit .
